description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a). 27 lines per page. Written in neat medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Thick dark cream paper with laid lines visible. Marginal annotations, mostly by the same hand as the main text. Some notes are attributed to Iṣfahānī, d. 749/1348 (see fol. 6a). Inscriptions and verses of poetry on fol. 1a-2a. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Foliation in red ink using Arabic numerals (starts with "2" on fol. 4a). Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "ʻAqāʼid 125". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "Ḥāʼ 244". Incipit: احمد الله حمدا يتقاصر عن ادراك غايته عقول العقلاء ... اما بعد فانه لما كان شرف العلم شرف معلومه ... [4أ] ... قال رحمه الله وبعد فمقصود الكتاب مرتب على مقدمة وثلثة كتب اقول مقصود الكتاب مرتب على مقدمة اعنى ما يتوقف عليه المباحث الاتية الكلامية Explicit: اقول هذا البحث ظاهر غنى عن الشرح وما نقل عن المطاعن ... مذكور فى كتاب نهاية العقول من اراد الاطلاع عليها فليطالعها وهذا اخر الكتاب والله اعلم بالصواب واليه المرجع والماب والحمد لله وحده وصلى الله ... واله وصحبه اجمعين
author: ʻIbrī, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, -1342 or 1343
abstract: Commentary on Ṭawāliʻ al-anwār min maṭāliʻ al-anẓār by ʻAbd Allāh al-Bayḍawī (d. ca. 685/1286). See detailed table of contents on fol. 2b-3a.
extent: i, 87, i leaves: paper ; 264 x 170 (200 x 120) mm. bound to 275 x 185 mm.
provenance: Several ownership statements in the name of ʻUbayd ibn al-Ḥājjī Muḥammad Afandī ; Ḥājjī ʻAlī Afandī, dated 1269 ; ...? ibn Mullā Ḥafīd Yūsuf Bāshā ; Aḥmad Najīb, dated 1289, etc. (fol. 1a), and in the name of Muṣtafá Ḥūrī? al-Mudarris, dated 1247 H. (fol. 3a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Several ownership statements in the name of ʻUbayd ibn al-Ḥājjī Muḥammad Afandī ; Ḥājjī ʻAlī Afandī, dated 1269 ; ...? ibn Mullā Ḥafīd Yūsuf Bāshā ; Aḥmad Najīb, dated 1289, etc. (fol. 1a), and in the name of Muṣtafá Ḥūrī? al-Mudarris, dated 1247 H. (fol. 3a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.

عبري، عبيد الله بن محمد

subject: Bayḍāwī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, d. 1286?—Ṭawāliʻ al-anwār.
binding_note: Dark brown leather over pasteboards for upper and lower covers and envelope flap. Gold-tooled border with a running pattern (flower and leaf). Paper pastedowns and endleaves.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
